team_0150_botan_01:
[BD06:0]Thanks for everything, [trnm:0].
And\r
you\r
too, Clive...[npcn:8]
team_0150_nelke_01: I’m glad I could see this through to the end.[npcn:1E]
team_0150_botan_02: I guess this is it for Team Star...and me, too—[npcn:8]
team_0150_nelke_02:
Hold that thought, Mis— Ah...Penny! I’d like to
check something with you first.[npcn:1E]
team_0150_nelke_03:
Why resort to something like Operation Starfall
if you’re the big boss of Team Star?\c
Wasn’t there any other way to handle this?[npcn:1E]
team_0150_botan_04:
I tried telling the bosses that we were done once
before. But they still didn’t quit...[npcn:8]
team_0150_nelke_04: Why not simply order them to?[npcn:1E]
team_0150_botan_05:
Our code states that no one in the team has the
right to order people around. I could ask them\r
all to do stuff, but I could never order them.[npcn:8]
team_0150_nelke_05:
So, it’s back to the code once again... The bosses
must’ve taken it very seriously.[npcn:1E]
team_0150_botan_06:
They did. That’s why I knew I could use it to force
Team Star to disband.[npcn:8]
team_0150_nelke_06:
Because the bosses would do anything the code
required of them? Even leave the team?[npcn:1E]
team_0150_botan_07:
Yes... And according to the code, they had to
accept any challenge made to them.[npcn:8]
team_0150_nelke_07: Thus the idea for Operation Starfall...[npcn:1E]
team_0150_nelke_08: Cassiopeia. Let me ask you one last thing.[npcn:1E]
team_0150_nelke_09:
What does Team Star— No, what do your friends
in the team mean to you?[npcn:1E]
team_0150_nelke_10:
Splendid. Thank you for apprising me of the
situation, Miss Penny.[npcn:1E]
team_0150_nelke_11:
Now, young lady, there’s something I should very
much like to discuss with you.[npcn:1E]
team_0150_botan_11:
Hey, quit it with the old geezer act, Clive!
You’re creeping me out...[npcn:8]
team_0150_nelke_12:
...Indeed. Well then, before we talk further, allow
me to reveal to you my own secret identity![npcn:1E]
team_0150_nelke_14:
Just as Cassiopeia was your disguise, the boy
you knew as Clive was mine![npcn:A]
team_0150_nelke_16:
I needed a way to talk to Team Star on
equal terms.[npcn:A]
team_0150_nelke_17:
Students do tend to shy from speaking their mind
to their teachers, after all... Much more so when\r
faced with the director of the academy.[npcn:A]
team_0150_botan_14:
Yeah, but...where do I even start? Wasn’t the
outfit a bit much?\c
Plus I have some big feelings about that wig...[npcn:8]
team_0150_nelke_18:
Ahem! Well, that’s quite enough of that for now.\c
Everyone! Why don’t you come on out?[npcn:A]
